mapper.select: select p.*, c.cate_name, b.brand_name from product p join category c on p.cate_no = c.cate_no join brand b on p.brand_no = b.brand_no where p.prod_no = #{prodNo}
select count(*) from review where prod_no = #{prodNo}
select * from review where prod_no = #{prodNo} order by review_no desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perDataCnt}
